member.name: P:JsonFx.History.HistoryManager.StartState
member.summary: Gets and sets the initial state object which represents this page request

member.name: P:JsonFx.History.HistoryManager.Callback
member.summary: Gets and sets the function name to be used as a callback when the history changes

member.name: P:JsonFx.History.HistoryManager.HistoryUrl
member.summary: Gets and sets the URL to be used when the history changes for browsers that do not accept virtually built documents

member.name: P:JsonFx.History.HistoryManager.IsDebugMode
member.summary: Gets and sets a value which shows or hides the history iframe.

member.name: P:JsonFx.History.HistoryManager.UsePhysicalUrl
member.summary: Gets a value which indicates if should use physical or virtual documents
